alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:47AM CDT until June 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR BEAVER...LIPSCOMB AND EASTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 147 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Beaver to 6 miles west of Lipscomb to 9 miles south of Wolf Creek Park, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Mocane, Slapout and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
